data.name: Yabgits: Haunted Cemetery
data.detailed_description:
Yet Another Breakout Game In The Store. And who doesn't love it?

In this game we will try to destroy a Haunted Cemetery, while the Reaper is watching!

Features list:
  • Uneven walls are a real challenge, where we don't have a good idea which direction the ball will go.
  • 30 balls, 30 levels. Can you finish with all the balls?
  • Every time you hit a wall, the bonus factor increases, but hit the paddle, we go back to zero. Can you beat your high score?

Pretty easy to play, the paddle follows you mouse. Don't waste more time, buy now and let's have some fun!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
